TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kus_kus, title = Kus_kus, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kus_kus} }

S.FORM: Kus kus Itiniay i Mudan Cen no Pingtung ko Kus kus a niyaro', 225 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 631 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 606 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 25 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Kos kos Itiniay i Modan Cen no Pingtong ko Kos kos a niyaro', 225 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 631 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 606 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 25 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
